name: RYN_WHT_TB_RADIOGRAPH
description: Data for Ryan White TB Chest Radiograph screenings.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RW_TB_RADIOGRAPH_DT
columns.description: The date of the Ryan White TB Chest Radiograph screening.

columns.name: RW_TB_RG_RSLT_C_NAME
columns.description: The result of the Ryan White TB Chest Radiograph screening.

columns.name: RW_TB_RG_SCORE
columns.description: The numerical score for the Ryan White TB Chest Radiograph screening.

columns.name: RW_TB_RG_COMMENTS
columns.description: The comments for the Ryan White TB Chest Radiograph screening.
